text: Mert & MarcusQuincy Jones, the legendary, award - winning producer who brought us Michael Jackson's Off the Wall, Thriller and Bad, knows a thing or two about music. And apparently, he's at best lukewarm about Taylor Swift's songwriting talent. In an interview with GQ, Jones says he's a big fan of artists like Bruno Mars, Kendrick Lamar, Drake, Jennifer Hudson and Mary J. Blige. When asked his opinion on Taylor's music, though, Jones says, ` ` We need more songs, man. F * * * ing songs, not hooks.'' When GQ points out that Taylor is considered one of the greatest modern - day songwriters, Jones laughs, ` ` Whatever crumbles your cookie.'' GQ then
